column4: when ive tried to install skype it writes me back libasound2 >1.0.12 libc6>2.3.6-6

when ive tried to install skype it writes me back libasound2 >1.0.12 libc6>2.3.6-6
i just want to install skype
go to unofficial faq for ubuntu. http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Feisty
execute as root: apt-get install libasound2
what version of Ubuntu are you using?
skype for 7.04 needs new libraries, so you have to download older one or upgrade your libraries
this would be the least problematic: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/upgrading
Just be ready to do the configuration again :-( Mine is a quarter of yours.
